title: Result Request
description: Schema for requesting Viral Load or EID results for a given manifest from the PCR laboratory.

sendingFacilityID.description: The unique identifier for the facility requesting the result.

sendingFacilityName.description: The name of the facility requesting the result.

receivingPCRLabID.description: The unique identifier for the PCR lab doing the analysis.

receivingPCRLabName.description: The name of the PCR lab doing the analysis.

testType.description: Type code specifying the type of result being requested. Code set: RESULT_TEST_TYPE.

manifestID.description: The unique identifier for the batch whose results are being requested.

transferStatus.description: Specifies whether the batch/sample was transferred.
